attributes.action: Allow the people of northern ireland the right to vote for a new assembly.
attributes.additional_details: Allow the people of northern ireland to elect a new assembly, one that actually works for the rights of the people.
attributes.background: Our assembly has failed us in many ways, arlenes RHI scheme, their refusal to work together, their inability to follow their own covid restrictions, to starting riots across the city. To creating brexit issues going against what the people have called for.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  This is a decision for the Northern Ireland Executive and the Northern Ireland Assembly. 

If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/

You can find contact details for your MLAs here: 

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/your-mlas/
